saint.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone who is given the title ‘saint’ by the Christian Church after they have died, because they have been very good or holy
saint.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Statues of saints lined the walls of the church.
saint.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: someone who is extremely good, kind, or patient
saint.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: His wife must have been a saint to put up with him for all those years.
